properties.name: numHeaderRows
properties.label: Number of Header Rows
properties.tooltip: The expected number of rows making up the input file header.

properties.name: latitudeColumn
properties.label: Latitude Column
properties.tooltip: The column label for the latitude data.

properties.name: longitudeColumn
properties.label: Longitude Column
properties.tooltip: The column label for the longitude data.

properties.name: nullEpsilon
properties.label: Null Island Epsilon
properties.tooltip: The amount of error permitted around the null island test.

properties.name: reportAlways
properties.label: Report All Errors?
properties.tooltip: Report all errors encountered or just the first.
